title: Phase 4: loadX Attribute Parsing Simplification (BREAKING)
description: Reduce supported syntax from 4 styles to 2 (data-lx-* + JSON config). Deprecate CSS class and colon syntax. Add compatibility mode (opt-in). Provide migration guide. Duration: 3-4 hours. BREAKING CHANGE - requires v2.0

title: Phase 5: loadX Performance Optimization
description: Implement ResizeObserver for CLS prevention instead of fixed dimensions. Optimize memory usage in long-running SPAs. Add performance benchmarks. Duration: 2-3 hours
